segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, I see the sink area first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs, filling the basin until it spills over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, pooling at the woman's feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She might slip any moment on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, the upper cabinets are ajar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy climbs the tilting stool toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he'll tumble down hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate while grabbing cookies with the other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, arm up, eyes on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if the stool gives way while she's so close?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a calm garden, so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's tense with all these hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hold my breath watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
